00026 {
00027         /*
00028         ** These next four methods are custom accessor functions to allow the Ogg Vorbis
00029         ** libraries to be able to stream audio data directly from an Ogre::DataStreamPtr
00030         */
00031         size_t  OOSStreamRead(void *ptr, size_t size, size_t nmemb, void *datasource)
00032         {
00033                 Ogre::DataStreamPtr dataStream = *reinterpret_cast<Ogre::DataStreamPtr*>(datasource);
00034                 return dataStream->read(ptr, size);
00035         }
00036 
00037         int             OOSStreamSeek(void *datasource, ogg_int64_t offset, int whence)
00038         {
00039                 Ogre::DataStreamPtr dataStream = *reinterpret_cast<Ogre::DataStreamPtr*>(datasource);
00040                 switch(whence)
00041                 {
00042                 case SEEK_SET:
00043                         dataStream->seek(offset);
00044                         break;
00045                 case SEEK_END:
00046                         dataStream->seek(dataStream->size());
00047                         // Falling through purposefully here
00048                 case SEEK_CUR:
00049                         dataStream->skip(offset);
00050                         break;
00051                 }
00052 
00053                 return 0;
00054         }
00055 
00056         int             OOSStreamClose(void *datasource)
00057         {
00058                 return 0;
00059         }
00060 
00061         long    OOSStreamTell(void *datasource)
00062         {
00063                 Ogre::DataStreamPtr dataStream = *reinterpret_cast<Ogre::DataStreamPtr*>(datasource);
00064                 return static_cast<long>(dataStream->tell());
00065         }

00067         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00068         OgreOggISound::OgreOggISound(const Ogre::String& name, bool seekSupport) : 
00069         mName(name),
00070         mSource(0), 
00071         mLoop(false), 
00072         mPlay(false), 
00073         mPosition(0,0,0), 
00074         mReferenceDistance(1.0f), 
00075         mDirection(0,0,0), 
00076         mVelocity(0,0,0), 
00077         mGain(1.0f), 
00078         mMaxDistance(1E10), 
00079         mMaxGain(1.0f), 
00080         mMinGain(0.0f), 
00081         mPitch(1.0f), 
00082         mRolloffFactor(1.0f), 
00083         mInnerConeAngle(360.0f), 
00084         mOuterConeAngle(360.0f), 
00085         mOuterConeGain(0.0f), 
00086         mPlayTime(0.0f), 
00087         mFadeTimer(0.0f), 
00088         mFadeTime(1.0f), 
00089         mFadeInitVol(0), 
00090         mFadeEndVol(1), 
00091         mFade(false),  
00092         mFadeEndAction(OgreOggSound::FC_NONE),  
00093         mStream(false), 
00094         mFinCBEnabled(false), 
00095         mLoopCBEnabled(false), 
00096         mGiveUpSource(false),  
00097         mPlayPosChanged(false),  
00098         mPlayPos(0.f), 
00099         mPriority(0), 
00100         mFinishedCB(0), 
00101         mLoopCB(0), 
00102         mScnMan(0),
00103         mLocalTransformDirty(true),
00104         mDisable3D(false),
00105         mSeekable(true),
00106         mSourceRelative(false)
00107         {
00108                 // Init some oggVorbis callbacks
00109                 mOggCallbacks.read_func = OOSStreamRead;
00110                 mOggCallbacks.close_func= OOSStreamClose;
00111                 mOggCallbacks.seek_func = OOSStreamSeek;
00112                 mOggCallbacks.tell_func = OOSStreamTell;
00113         }
00114         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00115         OgreOggISound::~OgreOggISound() 
00116         {
00117                 mAudioStream.setNull();
00118         }
00119         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00120         void OgreOggISound::play()
00121         {
00122 #if OGGSOUND_THREADED
00123                 SoundAction action;
00124                 action.mSound = this;
00125                 action.mAction = LQ_PLAY;
00126                 action.mParams = 0;
00127                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingletonPtr()->_requestSoundAction(action);
00128 #else
00129                 _playImpl();
00130 #endif
00131         }

00133         void OgreOggISound::stop()
00134         {
00135 #if OGGSOUND_THREADED
00136                 SoundAction action;
00137                 action.mSound = this;
00138                 action.mAction = LQ_STOP;
00139                 action.mParams = 0;
00140                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingletonPtr()->_requestSoundAction(action);
00141 #else
00142                 _stopImpl();
00143 #endif
00144         }

00154 #else

00158         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00159         void OgreOggISound::disable3D(bool disable)
00160         {
00161                 // Set flag
00162                 mDisable3D = disable;
00163 
00172                 if ( mDisable3D )
00173                 {
00174                         mSourceRelative = true;
00175                         mReferenceDistance = 1.f;
00176                         mPosition = Ogre::Vector3::ZERO;
00177 
00178                         if ( mSource!=AL_NONE ) 
00179                         {
00180                                 alSourcei(mSource, AL_SOURCE_RELATIVE, mSourceRelative);
00181                                 alSourcef(mSource, AL_REFERENCE_DISTANCE, mReferenceDistance);
00182                                 alSource3f(mSource, AL_POSITION, mPosition.x, mPosition.y, mPosition.z);
00183                         }
00184                 }
00193                 else
00194                 {
00195                         mSourceRelative = false;
00196 
00197                         if ( mSource!=AL_NONE ) 
00198                         {
00199                                 alSourcei(mSource, AL_SOURCE_RELATIVE, mSourceRelative);
00200                         }
00201                 }
00202         }

00289         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00290         void OgreOggISound::setConeAngles(float insideAngle, float outsideAngle)
00291         {
00292                 if(insideAngle < 0 || insideAngle > 360)        return;
00293                 if(outsideAngle < 0 || outsideAngle > 360)      return;
00294 
00295                 mInnerConeAngle = insideAngle;
00296                 mOuterConeAngle = outsideAngle;
00297 
00298                 if(mSource != AL_NONE)
00299                 {
00300                         alSourcef (mSource, AL_CONE_INNER_ANGLE,        mInnerConeAngle);
00301                         alSourcef (mSource, AL_CONE_OUTER_ANGLE,        mOuterConeAngle);
00302                 }
00303         }

00364         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00365         void OgreOggISound::_initSource()
00366         {
00367                 //'reset' the source properties                 
00368                 if(mSource != AL_NONE)
00369                 {
00370                         alSourcef (mSource, AL_GAIN, mGain);
00371                         alSourcef (mSource, AL_MAX_GAIN, mMaxGain);
00372                         alSourcef (mSource, AL_MIN_GAIN, mMinGain);
00373                         alSourcef (mSource, AL_MAX_DISTANCE, mMaxDistance);     
00374                         alSourcef (mSource, AL_ROLLOFF_FACTOR, mRolloffFactor);
00375                         alSourcef (mSource, AL_REFERENCE_DISTANCE, mReferenceDistance);
00376                         alSourcef (mSource, AL_CONE_OUTER_GAIN, mOuterConeGain);
00377                         alSourcef (mSource, AL_CONE_INNER_ANGLE,        mInnerConeAngle);
00378                         alSourcef (mSource, AL_CONE_OUTER_ANGLE,        mOuterConeAngle);
00379                         alSource3f(mSource, AL_POSITION, mPosition.x, mPosition.y, mPosition.z);
00380                         alSource3f(mSource, AL_DIRECTION, mDirection.x, mDirection.y, mDirection.z);
00381                         alSource3f(mSource, AL_VELOCITY, mVelocity.x, mVelocity.y, mVelocity.z);
00382                         alSourcef (mSource, AL_PITCH, mPitch);
00383                         alSourcei (mSource, AL_SOURCE_RELATIVE, mSourceRelative);
00384                         alSourcei (mSource, AL_LOOPING, mStream ? AL_FALSE : mLoop);
00385                 }
00386         }
00387         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00388         Ogre::Real OgreOggISound::getVolume() const
00389         {
00390                 Ogre::Real vol=0.f;
00391                 if(mSource != AL_NONE)
00392                 {
00393                         alGetSourcef(mSource, AL_GAIN, &vol);           
00394                 }
00395 
00396                 return vol;
00397         }

00399         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00400         void OgreOggISound::startFade(bool fDir, Ogre::Real fadeTime, FadeControl actionOnComplete)
00401         {
00402                 mFade=true;
00403             mFadeInitVol=fDir? 0.f : getVolume();
00404                 mFadeEndVol=fDir?1.f:0.f;
00405                 mFadeTimer=0.f;
00406                 mFadeEndAction=actionOnComplete;
00407                 mFadeTime = fadeTime;
00408                 // Automatically start if not currently playing
00409                 if ( mFadeEndVol==1 )
00410                         if ( !isPlaying() )
00411                                 this->play();
00412         }
00413 
00414         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00415         void OgreOggISound::_updateFade(Ogre::Real fTime)
00416         {
00417                 if (mFade)
00418                 {
00419                         if ( (mFadeTimer+=fTime) > mFadeTime )
00420                         {
00421                                 setVolume(mFadeEndVol);
00422                                 mFade = false;
00423                                 // Perform requested action on completion
00424                                 // NOTE:- Must go through SoundManager when using threads to avoid any corruption/mutex issues.
00425                                 switch ( mFadeEndAction ) 
00426                                 {
00427                                 case FC_PAUSE: 
00428                                         { 
00429                                                 pause(); 
00430                                         } 
00431                                         break;
00432                                 case FC_STOP: 
00433                                         { 
00434                                                 stop(); 
00435                                         } 
00436                                         break;
00437                                 }
00438                         }
00439                         else
00440                         {
00441                                 Ogre::Real vol = (mFadeEndVol-mFadeInitVol)*(mFadeTimer/mFadeTime);
00442                                 setVolume(mFadeInitVol + vol);
00443                         }
00444                 } 
00445         }
00446 
00447         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00448         void OgreOggISound::_markPlayPosition()
00449         {
00456                 if ( !mSeekable || (mSource==AL_NONE) || mStream )
00457                         return;
00458 
00459                 alSourcePause(mSource);
00460                 alGetSourcef(mSource, AL_SEC_OFFSET, &mPlayPos);
00461         }
00462 
00463         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00464         void OgreOggISound::_recoverPlayPosition()
00465         {
00466                 if ( !mSeekable || (mSource==AL_NONE) || mStream )
00467                         return;
00468 
00469                 alSourcef(mSource, AL_SEC_OFFSET, mPlayPos);
00470                 if (alGetError())
00471                 {
00472                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("***--- OgreOggISound::_recoverPlayPosition() - Unable to set play position", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00473                 }
00474         }

00476         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00477         bool OgreOggISound::isPlaying() const
00478         {
00479                 if(mSource != AL_NONE)
00480                 {
00481                         ALenum state;
00482                         alGetError();    
00483                         alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_SOURCE_STATE, &state);
00484                         return (state == AL_PLAYING);
00485                 }
00486 
00487                 // May have been kicked off and is currently waiting to be reactivated
00488                 // Return its previous status..
00489                 return mPlay;
00490         }
00491         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00492         bool OgreOggISound::isPaused() const
00493         {
00494                 if(mSource != AL_NONE)
00495                 {
00496                         ALenum state;
00497                         alGetError();    
00498                         alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_SOURCE_STATE, &state);
00499                         return (state == AL_PAUSED);
00500                 }
00501 
00502                 return false;
00503         }
00504         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00505         bool OgreOggISound::isStopped() const
00506         {
00507                 if(mSource != AL_NONE)
00508                 {
00509                         ALenum state;
00510                         alGetError();    
00511                         alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_SOURCE_STATE, &state);
00512                         return (state == AL_STOPPED);
00513                 }
00514 
00515                 return true;
00516         }
00517         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00518         void OgreOggISound::setPlayPosition(Ogre::Real seconds)
00519         {
00520                 // Invalid time - exit
00521                 if ( !mSeekable || seconds<0.f ) 
00522                         return;
00523 
00524                 // Wrap time
00525                 if ( seconds > mPlayTime ) 
00526                 {
00527                         do              { seconds-=mPlayTime; }
00528                         while   ( seconds>mPlayTime );
00529                 }
00530 
00531                 // Set offset if source available
00532                 if ( mSource!=AL_NONE )
00533                 {
00534                         alGetError();
00535                         alSourcef(mSource, AL_SEC_OFFSET, seconds);
00536                         if (alGetError())
00537                         {
00538                                 Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("***--- OgreOggISound::setPlayPosition() - Error setting play position", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00539                         }
00540                         // Reset flag
00541                         mPlayPosChanged = false;
00542                 }
00543                 // Mark it so it can be applied when sound receives a source
00544                 else
00545                 {
00546                         mPlayPosChanged = true;
00547                         mPlayPos = seconds;
00548                 }
00549         }
00550         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00551         bool OgreOggISound::addCuePoint(Ogre::Real seconds)
00552         {
00553                 // Valid time?
00554                 if ( seconds > 0.f )
00555                 {
00556                         mCuePoints.push_back(seconds);
00557                         return true;
00558                 }
00559                 else
00560                         return false;
00561         }
00562         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00563         void OgreOggISound::removeCuePoint(unsigned short index)
00564         {
00565                 if ( mCuePoints.empty() || ((int)mCuePoints.size()<=index) )
00566                         return;
00567 
00568                 // Erase element
00569                 mCuePoints.erase(mCuePoints.begin()+index);
00570         }
00571 
00572         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00573         Ogre::Real OgreOggISound::getCuePoint(unsigned short index)
00574         {
00575                 if ( mCuePoints.empty() || ((int)mCuePoints.size()<=index) )
00576                         return -1.f;
00577 
00578                 // get element
00579                 return mCuePoints.at(index);
00580         }
00581 
00582         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00583         void OgreOggISound::setCuePoint(unsigned short index)
00584         {
00585                 if ( mCuePoints.empty() || ((int)mCuePoints.size()<=index) )
00586                         return;
00587 
00588                 // set cue point
00589                 setPlayPosition(mCuePoints.at(index));
00590         }

00602         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00603         void OgreOggISound::update(Ogre::Real fTime)
00604         {
00605                 if (mLocalTransformDirty)
00606                 {
00607                         if (!mDisable3D && mParentNode)
00608                         {
00609                                 mPosition = mParentNode->_getDerivedPosition();
00610                                 mDirection = -mParentNode->_getDerivedOrientation().zAxis();
00611                         }
00612 
00613                         if(mSource != AL_NONE)
00614                         {
00615                                 alSource3f(mSource, AL_POSITION, mPosition.x, mPosition.y, mPosition.z);
00616                                 alSource3f(mSource, AL_DIRECTION, mDirection.x, mDirection.y, mDirection.z);
00617                         }
00618 
00619                         mLocalTransformDirty = false;
00620                 }       
00621 
00622                 _updateFade(fTime);
00623         }

00646         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00647         void OgreOggISound::_notifyAttached(Ogre::Node* node, bool isTagPoint)
00648         {
00649                 // Call base class notify
00650                 Ogre::MovableObject::_notifyAttached(node, isTagPoint);
00651 
00652                 // Immediately set position/orientation when attached
00653                 if (mParentNode)
00654                 {
00655                         mPosition = mParentNode->_getDerivedPosition();
00656                         mDirection = -mParentNode->_getDerivedOrientation().zAxis();
00657                 }
00658 
00659                 // Set tarnsform immediately if possible
00660                 if(mSource != AL_NONE)
00661                 {
00662                         alSource3f(mSource, AL_POSITION, mPosition.x, mPosition.y, mPosition.z);
00663                         alSource3f(mSource, AL_DIRECTION, mDirection.x, mDirection.y, mDirection.z);
00664                 }
00665 
00666                 return;
00667         }
